entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.content:

Application Description

"The End of Han Dynasty" requer que a vers√£o do sistema seja iOS 16 e superior e use iPhone 7 ou 7Plus, iPhone 8 ou 8 Plus, iPhone X e superior, iPad Air 2, iPad mini 4, iPad 2017 ou qualquer iPad Pro para jogar. Introdu√ß√£o do jogo "Tr√™s Reinos: Hegemonia no Fim da Dinastia Han" √© um jogo SLG baseado em turnos cuidadosamente produzido pelo Longyou Tianxia Studio. √â baseado principalmente no novo pensamento das pessoas e na nova perspectiva do jogo Tr√™s Reinos para criar um mundo diferente dos Tr√™s Reinos. Com base no retorno √† categoria de estrat√©gia tradicional, ele retrata profundamente as diferen√ßas regionais entre as cidades dos tr√™s pa√≠ses e as semelhan√ßas e diferen√ßas das pr√≥prias capacidades e caracter√≠sticas de cada comandante militar. Em termos de combate, destaca o encanto de combinar a hora certa, o lugar certo e a implanta√ß√£o de pessoas. Funcionalidades do jogo Um: estilo cl√°ssico de bordado com desenho de linha branca, simples e elegante As cabe√ßas dos personagens adotam o estilo e a cor do bordado em linha branca da cl√°ssica hist√≥ria em quadrinhos "Romance dos Tr√™s Reinos". A interface do jogo adota o estilo antigo e o design com charme antigo, aut√™ntico estilo chin√™s. Dois: modo de gest√£o governamental simples e f√°cil de usar: Arranjos b√°sicos de assuntos internos, explora√ß√£o de pessoal, reconhecimento militar e desenvolvimento de tecnologia adotam um modo de gerenciamento de posicionamento para reduzir opera√ß√µes tediosas e repetitivas e permitir que os jogadores se concentrem em outros eventos. No modo de jogo monarca, os jogadores s√≥ precisam prestar aten√ß√£o √† gest√£o da capital e do pa√≠s. Outras cidades s√£o entregues ao prefeito. Use a pol√≠tica para dar diferentes instru√ß√µes militares e pol√≠ticas para a subcidade. Tr√™s: configura√ß√µes de conte√∫do de jogo extremamente ricas: De 184 a 280 DC, mais de 1.300 generais (incluindo generais hist√≥ricos e hist√≥ricos) apareceram em cena. As capacidades b√°sicas de 30 generais s√£o divididas e as capacidades dos generais s√£o diferenciadas em detalhes. Mais de 300 configura√ß√µes independentes das caracter√≠sticas dos generais, totalmente destacar as diferen√ßas individuais dos generais. Existem mais de 500 itens e cen√°rios de tesouro com evid√™ncias de pesquisa. Uma variedade de classifica√ß√µes √© dividida para atender a diferentes prefer√™ncias. Quase mais de 60 tipos diferentes de cidades, mais de 200 caracter√≠sticas urbanas bem documentadas e produtos especiais. Ricos itens de desenvolvimento t√©cnico e suporte em todo o sistema de jogo. Reflete a import√¢ncia da for√ßa cient√≠fica e tecnol√≥gica. As seis armas b√°sicas e mais de uma d√∫zia de armas especiais constituem um rico sistema de armas. Sistema super rico de cargos oficiais e t√≠tulos nobres. O sistema de casamento apontado pelo monarca e o sistema de treinamento e heran√ßa infantil humanizado. V√°rios fen√¥menos naturais e desastres de eventos simulam o per√≠odo conturbado dos Tr√™s Reinos. Muitas for√ßas estrangeiras e bandidos e bandidos precisam de voc√™ para esmag√°-los e elimin√°-los. Uma riqueza de visitas, mercadores, imortais, celebridades, m√©dicos, mestres artes√£os, espadachins vagam por a√≠, desencadeando v√°rios eventos funcionais. Quatro: Retorne ao sistema cl√°ssico de combate baseado em turnos, com foco na forma√ß√£o estrat√©gica de tropas A introdu√ß√£o do clima, topografia e alturas dos blocos destaca com mais destaque a influ√™ncia dos fatores de tempo e localiza√ß√£o na guerra. entry.title: Way of the Hunter Wild America
entry.id: Way of the Hunter Wild America-pt-1767838343014
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö9,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 6,99¬†‚Ç¨ [4,99¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 9,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

Compras integradas

  • Hunter's PackÔºö1,99¬†‚Ç¨
  • Steyr Arms PackÔºö2,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

Aproveite a primeira entrada da s√©rie m√≥vel Way of the Hunter, ambientada no belo noroeste do Pac√≠fico norte-americano. Esta experi√™ncia de ca√ßa aut√™ntica deixa voc√™ ca√ßar e explorar ambientes abertos enormes nos Nez Perce Valleys dos Estados Unidos. Encontre animais realistas em belos habitats naturais e utilize diversas r√©plicas detalhadas de armas. Way of the Hunter oferece uma experi√™ncia altamente imersiva e integrada, com vida selvagem deslumbrante e comportamento realista dos grupos de animais. Testemunhe as transforma√ß√µes em ecossistemas complexos, que reagem e se adaptam ao que voc√™ fizer. Aprenda a ca√ßar de verdade e ponha suas habilidades √† prova. Enfrente os desafios da ca√ßa √©tica com uma hist√≥ria cativante, ou simplesmente divirta-se ca√ßando em ambientes deslumbrantes. * Dezenas de esp√©cies incrivelmente detalhadas com comportamentos realistas para proporcionar uma experi√™ncia de ca√ßa verdadeiramente imersiva. * Cace como um profissional com recursos que destacam sinais de animais e analisam respingos de sangue. Analise a trajet√≥ria dos seus disparos com a c√¢mera rebobin√°vel. * Use seu sentido de ca√ßador para destacar detalhes e informa√ß√µes importantes, ou desative-o. * O complexo sistema de trof√©us gera chifres exclusivos com base em v√°rios fatores, como estado f√≠sico e idade das ca√ßas. * Anima√ß√µes e rea√ß√µes de animais naturais e sofisticadas ao sentir a presen√ßa dos jogadores. * Ciclos de dia e noite com 24 horas, al√©m de vento e clima vari√°veis. * Simula√ß√£o real√≠stica de bal√≠stica e de f√≠sica de proj√©teis. * Grande sele√ß√£o de armas de fogo e equipamentos, incluindo itens licenciados das empresas Bushnell, Federal, Leupold, Primos, Remington e Steyr Arms. * A economia do jogo permite a voc√™ ca√ßar e vender a carne para comprar mais equipamentos, licen√ßas de ca√ßa e servi√ßos de taxidermia para seus trof√©us. * Uma hist√≥ria cativante sobre os obst√°culos enfrentados por uma empresa familiar de ca√ßa e a rivalidade e amizades que a cercam. * Modo de fotografia intuitivo, para capturar e compartilhar seus momentos favoritos. * Rastreie a sua presa usando ou o gamepad ou os controles de toque * Controle otimizado e eficiente para dispositivos m√≥veis AVISO: Dispositivos com menos de 4 GB de RAM n√£o s√£o suportados! Necessita de um dispositivo com pelo menos 6 GB de RAM para utilizar as defini√ß√µes gr√°ficas mais elevadas. Editora: http://www.handy-games.com/contact/ ¬© www.handy-games.com GmbH

entry.title: Dungeon and Puzzles
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö2,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 1,99¬†‚Ç¨ [1,99¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 2,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö1,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

-- Awards: ‚óè 2021 BitSummit THE 8th BIT: Official Selection ‚óè Busan Indie Connect 2020: Excellence in Casual ‚óè Bahamut 2020 ACG Creation Contest: Bronze Award About: Dungeon and Puzzles is a game that challenges players' 2D spatial perception and logical thinking. A player can use a sword to attack monsters, or a bow and an arrow to destroy enemies from afar. Pushing the obstacles back with a shield and pulling the monsters with a pair of special gloves. There are 150 handcrafted rooms in the dungeon. Players will have to get a better understanding of the game to solve the puzzles and clear the rooms. To beat the puzzles with fewer moves, achieving advanced goals, players will have to try different tactics and move combinations to find an optimized solution for the room. Sometimes a player would need to put the old solution aside and take on a new perspective towards the problem, reexamine and rethink before making a move. Features: ‚óè Dungeon + Puzzle + Sokoban ‚óè 150 handcrafted rooms ‚óè Fantasy themed pixel art ‚óè Non-linear dungeon map -- ‚óè Follow us on Twitter https://twitter.com/nekolyst ‚óè Like us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/Nekolyst ‚óè Join our Discord server https://discord.gg/A7Sss9d

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Pasha Planet: Reborn
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö3,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 1,99¬†‚Ç¨ [1,99¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 3,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö1,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

‚ÄúPasha Planet: Reborn‚Äù is the debut game of Scorpio Game, a Taiwanese independent game development studio. Prepare to be charmed by unique hand-painted scenes and have fun with light detective work, players will get to explore the main game plot that revolves around the characters‚Äô daily life through an immersive and one-of-a-kind puzzle-solving gameplay. [Game Overview] The story takes place on the distant planet of Pasha. A prosperous underground city, which are inhabited by adorable doggies, can be found there. They live in peace day after day, enjoying the convenience brought about by technology. However, the protagonist Bobbie, who grew up in the city, often fantasizes about getting out of the closed-off Underground City to see the world outside. This is where the main story line of the game begins. Players will take on the role of Bobbie and explore the seemingly calm and peaceful city, which is in actual fact, facing an energy crisis. Players must clear stages of challenges to solve the final mystery and figure out a way to save all the inhabitants before disaster strikes! [Game Features] - Created by an independent game development studio in Taiwan. - Classic click-and-point puzzle-solving gameplay. - Charming and heartwarming hand-painted scenes. - Challenging puzzles and stages.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: This is the Police
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö7,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 1,99¬†‚Ç¨ [0,99¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 7,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö1,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

"Mergulhe numa hist√≥ria intensa de corrup√ß√£o, crimes e intrigas. Encarne o r√≠gido Chefe de Pol√≠cia Jack Boyd e fique cara a cara com a esc√≥ria de Freeburg, uma cidade em queda livre. Ser√° que Jack vai chegar √† aposentadoria com uma bolada, esperando para ser gasta, ou vai acabar durango‚Ä¶ ou pior ainda? Seja tragado por este pol√™mico conto de corrup√ß√£o, crime e intriga policial. Gerencie sua equipe, atende √†s emerg√™ncias e investigue os crimes numa cidade √† beira do caos. O submundo da m√°fia trama por tr√°s dos panos, fincando suas garras cada vez mais fundo na cidade, mesmo o prefeito estando pronto para explorar cada situa√ß√£o para levar vantagem pol√≠tica. Escolha sua abordagem a cada situa√ß√£o √† medida que ela se desenrola. Voc√™ √†s vezes vai reagir a uma crise se desdobrando numa cena de crime, ou negociar com os chef√µes do crime de Freeburg. Outras vezes, voc√™ vai se deparar se esquivando de perguntas feitas numa coletiva de imprensa, ou at√© mesmo num eventual interrogat√≥rio no rol de testemunhas. Ser√° que voc√™ consegue evitar que este vulc√£o entre em erup√ß√£o, pelo menos at√© conseguir um bom p√© de meia para a aposentadoria? Ou ser√° que voc√™ vai acabar atr√°s das grades ‚Äî ou pior?" - Sua miss√£o √© simples: Conseguir $ 500.000 em 180 dias, antes de Jack Boyd se aposentar. Como? A√≠ √© com voc√™! - Decis√µes, decis√µes e mais decis√µes: em mi√∫dos, ‚ÄúThis Is the Police‚Äù √© uma hist√≥ria sombria e como voc√™ reage a ela. Qualquer que seja a sua decis√£o, ela influenciar√° o jogo ‚Äî e, portanto, o destino de Jack Boyd. - O bem, o mal‚Ä¶ a esc√≥ria? O Chefe do Departamento de Pol√≠cia de Freeburg lida com todos os tipos de pessoas. Vai de voc√™ separar os bons dos maus. - Cumpra com suas obriga√ß√µes: Como chefe do DP de Freeburg, Jack deve cuidar das atividades cotidianas: atender √†s emerg√™ncias, gerenciar seus policiais, brigar pelo or√ßamento‚Ä¶ - Comece resolvendo as Investiga√ß√µes e consiga evid√™ncias contra as gangues criminosas de Freeburg. - Negocie com os diferentes poderes da cidade: o prefeito, a m√°fia, a igreja, o sindicato dos trabalhadores. Todos oferecem favores, mas tudo tem seu pre√ßo. - Dublagem feita totalmente pelo glorioso Jon St. John (vulgo: a voz do Duke Nukem).

Application Screenshot

entry.title: Stream Music Player
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö1,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí Gratuito [Gratuito ~ 1,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöGratuito

Application Description

--- Special release price 50% off! --- Stream was created to give you a seamless listening, managing and syncing cloud music experience. It allows you to create a personal streaming service with cloud storage like Box, Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive and Yandex.Disk to save space on your device and have access to all of your music. How it works? Upload all music to your favourite cloud storage then use Stream to connect and enjoy your music anywhere. Add your music to your device without iTunes, easy and fast using local WiFi transfer or download music to your iPhone to play it without internet (Offline mode). It‚Äôs a multi-cloud system therefore you can stream lists of music regardless where they are stored. Access your favourite music across all your devices: iPhone, iPad, iPod library, Box, Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive, Yandex.Disk and your computer. Stream your music with in advanced and powerful media player. Music player: - Full featured media player - Sleep timer - Lock screen playback controls - Background music playback - Equalizer with BassBooster - Over 20 realistic EQ presets - Stylish audio Visualizer - Fine scrubbing - Album cover art Playlists: - Create your own playlists Media Library: - Import music from your iPod library - Tabs for Songs, Albums, Artists Manager: - Wi-Fi Transfer - Download and upload music, pictures, archives from - Box - Dropbox - Google Drive - OneDrive - Yandex.Disk - Move, rename or delete tracks & songs - Search by artist, title, album - Create and manage folders

Application Description

Abra caminho no soco pelas ruas de Streets of Rage mais uma vez! Streets of Rage 4 traz o legado do jogo neste beat'em rretr√¥, com gr√°ficos inspirados em quadrinhos desenhados √† m√£o e mec√¢nica atualizada. Streets of Rage volta para uma sequ√™ncia 25 anos ap√≥s o √∫ltimo epis√≥dio: um novo sindicato do crime parece ter assumido o controle das ruas e corrompido a pol√≠cia. Tudo que voc√™ tem dispon√≠vel para lutar contra eles s√£o seus amigos... e seus punhos! Streets of Rage 4 foi aclamado pela cr√≠tica e ganhou v√°rios pr√™mios inclusive foi indicado como Melhor Jogo de A√ß√£o no Game Awards 2020. CARACTER√çSTICAS - Redescubra a franquia do cl√°ssico Beat em up - Streets of Rage - com mec√¢nicas de luta atualizadas - Emocione-se com uma dire√ß√£o art√≠stica inspirada em quadrinhos retr√¥ desenhada √† m√£o pelo est√∫dio por tr√°s de Wonder Boy: The Dragon's Trap, trazendo anima√ß√µes prazerosas e efeitos v√≠vidos - Desbloqueie at√© 5 novos personagens emblem√°ticos jog√°veis e lute em 12 fases diferentes para trazer de volta a ordem √†s ruas - Desafie-se em diferentes modos: Hist√≥ria, Treinamento, Arcade... - Ou√ßa uma nova trilha sonora Eletro com m√∫sicos internacionais, como Olivier Derivi√®re e lenda Yuzo Koshiro - Cultue o retr√¥ com at√© 13 personagens alternativos, n√≠veis secretos, ou escolha a trilha SoR1&2 e ative os gr√°ficos Pixel Retr√¥! * NOVA GRANDE ACTUALIZA√á√ÉO GRATUITA* - Nova cooperativa move-se - +300 melhorias no jogo - Novo modo de sobreviv√™ncia personalizado para o DLC (Mr. X Nightmare) - Novos destro√≠veis para ajudar a manter o contador combinado -ATUALIZA√á√ÉO MULTIJOGADOR- - Jogue on-line com um amigo e, juntos, acabem com o plano maligno dos g√™meos Y! - Teste sua for√ßa: mergulhe no modo de batalha e lute com amigos em suas fases preferidas -DLC Mr. X Nightmare- A luta continua em Wood Oak City. Ap√≥s os eventos de Streets of Rage 4, nossos her√≥is foram se preparar para futuras amea√ßas. Axel, Blaze e seus companheiros come√ßar√£o um treinamento muito especial com a ajuda do Dr. Zan, que construiu um programa de IA a partir dos restos do c√©rebro do Mister X que simula todo tipo de perigo que podem enfrentar. Com este DLC, prepare-se para: ‚Ä¢ 3 personagens jog√°veis novos ‚Ä¢ Um novo modo de sobreviv√™ncia com desafios semanais ‚Ä¢ Personaliza√ß√£o de personagens: construa o pr√≥prio estilo de luta com novos movimentos ‚Ä¢ Novas armas e inimigos! modo multijogador n√£o estar√° dispon√≠vel no lan√ßamento, mas vir√° em uma atualiza√ß√£o gratuita ap√≥s o lan√ßamento. modo multijogador n√£o estar√° dispon√≠vel no lan√ßamento, mas vir√° em uma atualiza√ß√£o gratuita ap√≥s o lan√ßamento. CUIDADOSAMENTE REPROJETADO PARA CELULAR - Interface renovada - Conquistas do Game Center - iCloud: Compartilhe o progresso entre dispositivos iOS - Compat√≠vel com controles MFi - Sem microtransa√ß√µes! Estale os dedos e prepare-se para Streets of Rage 4 de onde estiver! Se voc√™ encontrar um problema, entre em contato conosco em support@playdigious.mail.helpshift.com com o m√°ximo de informa√ß√µes poss√≠veis sobre o assunto, ou consulte nossas FAQs em https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/6-streets-of-rage-4/

Application Description

Build your ramen rep by fashioning the ultimate bowl from a vast assortment of noodles, soup, and toppings. From roast pork to miso, mackerel, and more--the only limit is your imagination, meaning you'll need to use your noodle to nail the right recipes and bring hungry customers in by the crowd! Enter contests and see how you size up against rivals, thus cementing your standing as superlative sensei of the savory! Succeed--and one day you might even have your own ramen theme park! -- Try searching for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at https://kairopark.jp. Uma nova lenda come√ßa aqui! Construa e administre uma vila nos campos, na neve e at√© no submundo! Construa estalagens, lojas de armas e mais, para convencer aventureiros a visitar. Use itens e equipamentos para aumentar o poder dos aventureiros e ajud√°-los a ganhar mais ouro e experi√™ncia em suas aventuras. Procure novas masmorras para explorar e novos monstros para enfrentar! Precisa de ajuda para atrair aventureiros? Tente construir novas instala√ß√µes, vender novos tipos de comida ou melhorar a √°rea local para ganhar T√≠tulos. Continue experimentando e acabar√° encontrando recompensas raras... √Ä medida que sua cidade cresce e fica mais popular, os aventureiros passar√£o a ir para morar, n√£o s√≥ visitar! O rol de inimigos do jogo anterior foi expandido com uma variedade de novos monstros peculiares para enfrentar. Dependendo do que fizer, alguns monstros se tornar√£o seus amigo! D√™ petiscos, agrade-os e eles se tornar√£o aliados valiosos em suas jornadas. Explore cada vez mais do mapa do mundo para desbloquear novas √°reas. Quer um recome√ßo? Mude sua cidade para outra regi√£o para descobrir monstros e aventureiros que ainda n√£o tinha visto. Fique cada vez melhor e construa a maior cidade que o reino j√° viu! entry.title: Burger Bistro Story
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö7,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 3,99¬†‚Ç¨ [3,99¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 7,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö3,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

Get ready to experience a new fast food sensation! Create your own diner and grill your way to success. Create different recipes and offer your patrons a truly customized experience! Think outside the box and experiment in the kitchen. Replace your meat patty with a fish fillet and tartare sauce, or a bacon, lettuce, and egg combo. You're limited only by your imagination! And the fun doesn't stop with burgers. Create menus for side dishes, drinks, and desserts to really capture the hearts of your customers! Just don't let your popularity go to your head. You'll need to manage your staff and train them to improve their skills. Before you know it, you'll be offering world-class customer service even during the lunchtime rush! Keep the cash flowing, and you'll be able to open extra branches of your restaurant. Can you handle running several stores at once? Will you crush your rivals and take their territory for yourself? Open your restaurant today and take the food industry by storm! -- Zoom in or adjust the screen size with touch controls. Try searching for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at https://kairopark.jp Be sure to check out both our free-to-play and our paid games! Kairosoft's pixel art game series continues! Follow us on X(Twitter) for the latest Kairosoft news and information. https://twitter.com/kairokun2010

entry.title: Jumbo Airport Story
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö6,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 2,99¬†‚Ç¨ [2,99¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 6,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö2,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

Make your fledgling airport into a world-famous international landmark jam-packed with entertainment! First build facilities such as Bistros and Bookstores to make visitors comfortable. Satisfied customers make your airport more popular, and will attract even more visitors! But the bigger your airport gets, the more tired visitors will be from walking around... Still, never fear! Simply place seating like Benches and Sofas near facilities, and visitors will be able to rest up. Oh, and don't forget Plants to soothe sore eyes! Seeing nature is especially important in places like airports, don't you think? So add some greenery to your airport scenery! Keep on truckin' until you can hold fairs and make your airport even livelier! You may even get some new visitors?! Make enough money to buy your own airliners and devise flight plans. Before long you'll be setting up regular flights! Sign contracts with foreign airline companies and make your airport a global player! Build up friendships with foreign cities and attract people from all over the world! So what are you waiting for? Help passengers travel the world and live out their dreams today! Supports drag to scroll and pinch to zoom. Search for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at https://kairopark.jp Be sure to check out both our free-to-play and our paid games! Kairosoft's pixel art game series continues! Follow us on Twitter for the latest Kairosoft news and information. https://twitter.com/kairokun2010

entry.title: Heian City Story
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö7,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 3,99¬†‚Ç¨ [3,99¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 7,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö3,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

Travel back to olden times and become Director of your own city! Attract new residents and try to become the greatest city in the land! Add buildings like restaurants and teahouses to make your town a place where samurai and commoners alike will want to live. This is the past, so don't forget to add some touches of traditional culture! Features like temples and gaming halls can give your city a lot of personality, especially when arranged in harmony with the surrounding environment. You might end up attracting tourists to the town, who will move in if they like it enough. It's not all fun and games in the mists of history. Sometimes ghost, demons, and other baddies will come to attack your city. You'll have to summon your own Guardian Spirits to banish the evil ones and keep your townsfolk safe. Consider your spirits' abilities and placement for the best effects - strategy is the key word! With a whole host of land expansion options, facilities, and residents to collect and customize, it's never been easier to create a city that will go down in history. Start building your ancient city today! -- Supports drag to scroll and pinch to zoom. Search for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at http://kairopark.jp Be sure to check out both our free-to-play and paid games! Kairosoft's pixel art game series continues! Follow us on X (Twitter) for the latest Kairosoft news and information. https://twitter.com/kairokun2010

entry.title: Cavern Adventurers
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö7,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 3,99¬†‚Ç¨ [3,99¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 7,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö3,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

In a faraway fantasy kingdom, everything was peaceful... Until monsters started pouring out of a hole in the ground! Put together a team of adventurers to secure, explore, and develop a vast underground network of caves in this cavern management simulator. Your adventurers will face all kinds of challenges in the underground, but there's no obstacle you can't deal with if you know how. Place torches to light up the darkness, build bridges to traverse gorges, and use explosives to clear away large rocks! To create a truly great cave, you'll have to stay on your toes and pay attention to the time of day. When the sun's up, organize your miners to discover new areas and build new fixtures. And when night falls, send in your adventurers to show those monsters who's boss! The deeper you dig, the better the treasure you'll find - just how deep can you go? All that fame can come at a price. As your cave becomes more popular, thieves will appear to try and make off with its treasures. Keep your booty safe by laying devious traps around the entrance! Not all monsters are bad. Some of them might even become your friends and fight alongside you! Once you make an entire floor safe, merchants will be able to move in and set up shop there. With a cut of the profits for you, of course! Keep developing the space and earning gold, and pretty soon you'll have the finest cave in all the land! In this quirky management sim, fun, adventure, and riches are lurking right under your nose... Or should we say, right under your boots? -- Supports drag to scroll and pinch to zoom. Search for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at http://kairopark.jp Be sure to check out both our free-to-play and paid games! Kairosoft's pixel art game series continues! Follow us on X (Twitter) for the latest Kairosoft news and information. https://twitter.com/kairokun2010

entry.title: Deco ‚Äì Lock Screen Wallpapers
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö2,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 1,99¬†‚Ç¨ [1,99¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 2,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö1,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

Your Lock Screen, Your Way. Create wallpapers that feel like you. Deco gives you everything you need to design custom lock screens and home screens ‚Äî from photos of your favorite people to hand-picked gradients, all with a canvas that's a joy to use. **Start with a Background** Photos ‚Äî Use any photo from your library. Deco intelligently separates subjects so stickers can tuck behind or in front of them. Gradients ‚Äî Blend smooth color transitions with a full editor and curated presets. Stripes ‚Äî Design custom stripe patterns. Control colors, angle, spacing, and more. Solids ‚Äî Pick the exact color that fits your mood. Browse the new background selector with Top Picks that change by season, time, and holidays ‚Äî plus categories like Nature, Moods, Vibrant, and Minimalist. **Sticker Studio** A complete sticker editor. Cut out photos, add text, drop in any emoji ‚Äî then customize borders, colors, and apply effects like pixelate, comic book, or sketch. All your stickers in one place. **A Canvas That Flows** Smoother, higher resolution, and more intuitive. Resize and move at the same time, select multiple items, duplicate instantly. It just works. **Share What You Make** Export entire canvases or individual stickers. Share with friends or keep them for yourself. **Also Includes** - Quick emoji picker for instant additions - Import from Camera and Files - Sorting options throughout - New icon collections: Stickerbomb, Kamoji, and Developer Classics Deco won the Swift Student Challenge 2025. Privacy Policy: https://docs.aethers.world/deco/privacypolicy Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
